creator: Active Investment Services
descriptionHtml:
Active Investment Services is one of India’s leading Mutual Fund Distributor. We provide comprehensive financial services - Goal based Financial Planning, Tax Planning, Retirement Planning and related Mutual Fund management services including for Mutual Funds and SIPs.


All Mutual Fund & SIPs investments can be made online without any paperwork.

Frequently asked Questions:

I want to learn more about mutual funds and SIPs. What should I do?

We have explained about mutual funds and SIPs in detail in the app in our Knowledge Area Section. You can use that to learn more about mutual funds. Apart from that our Team are available to help you too.

How can I plan my Mutual Fund investments?

After registration, please proceed to activate your account. Once activated you will be allotted a dedicated Mutual Fund Expert. They will help you from planning your investments and manage your Mutual Funds.

What other services do your Mutual Fund Expert provide?

Our Mutual Fund Expert provides comprehensive financial advisory - Goal Bases Financial Planning, Tax Planning and Retirement Planning for you and your family.

Can I track my existing mutual funds on Active Investment Services?

We have a mutual fund portfolio tracker where you can import and track all your mutual funds on the app.

Can I start SIPs on Active Investment Services?

Yes, you can start SIPs in any of the 4000+ mutual funds on Active Investment Services in less than few minutes.

Can I save tax by investing in mutual funds?

Yes, you can invest in ELSS mutual funds (ELSS) to save tax under Section 80c.

What are the charges for using Active Investment Services?

Active Investment Services is completely free of cost for you to use.

Can I track investments made on other Mutual Fund apps here?

Yes you can!

I have invested in mutual funds offline. Can I track them here?

Yes, you can use our Mutual Fund portfolio tracker facility to track all your mutual fund investments and SIPs online.

There are other Mutual Fund tracking apps such as MyCAMS, KFinKart, IPru Touch, SBI MF etc. What are the benefits of tracking Mutual Fund investments here?

Apps such as MyCAMS, KFinKart, IPru Touch and SBI MF provide limited number of AMCs to track whereas on Active Investment Services you can track investments across all AMCs.

Which mutual funds and SIPs are available on Active Investment Services?

The following mutual fund companies are available.

1. Axis Mutual Fund
2. Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund
3. Canara Robeco Mutual Fund
4. DSP Blackrock Mutual Fund
5. Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund
6. HDFC Mutual Fund
7. ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund
8. IDFC Mutual Fund
0. Invesco Mutual Fund
10. Kotak Mahindra Mutual Fund
11. L&T Mutual Fund
12. Mirae Asset Mutual Fund
13. Motilal Oswal Mutual Fund
14. Peerless Mutual Fund
15. Principal Mutual Fund
16. Reliance Mutual Fund
17. SBI Mutual Fund
18. Tata Mutual Fund
19 UTI Mutual Fund

Apart from online mutual funds and SIPs, we also provide a mutual fund portfolio tracker facility which can be used to track all your mutual fund investments in one place. Active Investment Services can be used as an SIP mutual fund app and a portfolio tracking app.

We are one of India's top rated Best Mutual Fund app, SIP App and ELSS Tax Saving Investment App.
descriptionShort: India’s Best Online Mutual Fund Investment App, SIP, ELSS & track MF Portfolio .

We have explained about mutual funds and SIPs in detail in the app in our Knowledge Area Section. You can use that to learn more about mutual funds. Apart from that our Team are available to help you too.

How can I plan my Mutual Fund investments?

After registration, please proceed to activate your account. Once activated you will be allotted a dedicated Mutual Fund Expert. They will help you from planning your investments and manage your Mutual Funds.

What other services do your Mutual Fund Expert provide?

Our Mutual Fund Expert provides comprehensive financial - Goal Bases Financial Planning, Tax Planning and Retirement Planning for you and your family.

Can I track my existing mutual funds on MF BAZAAR?

We have a mutual fund portfolio tracker where you can import and track all your mutual funds on the app.

Can I start SIPs on MF BAZAAR?

Yes, you can start SIPs in any of the 4000+ mutual funds on MF BAZAAR in less than few minutes.

Can I save tax by investing in mutual funds?

Yes, you can invest in ELSS mutual funds (ELSS) to save tax under Section 80c.

What are the charges for using MF BAZAAR?

Active Investment Services is completely free of cost for you to use.

Can I track investments made on other Mutual Fund apps here?

Yes you can!

I have invested in mutual funds offline. Can I track them here?

Yes, you can use our Mutual Fund portfolio tracker facility to track all your mutual fund investments and SIPs online.

There are other Mutual Fund tracking apps such as MyCAMS, KFinKart, IPru Touch, SBI MF etc. What are the benefits of tracking Mutual Fund investments here?

Apps such as MyCAMS, KFinKart, IPru Touch and SBI MF provide limited number of AMCs to track whereas on Active Investment Services you can track investments across all AMCs.

Which mutual funds and SIPs are available on MF BAZAAR?

The following mutual fund companies are available.

1. Axis Mutual Fund
2. Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund
3. Canara Robeco Mutual Fund
4. DSP Blackrock Mutual Fund
5. Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund
6. HDFC Mutual Fund
7. ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund
8. IDFC Mutual Fund
0. Invesco Mutual Fund
10. Kotak Mahindra Mutual Fund
11. L&T Mutual Fund
12. Mirae Asset Mutual Fund
13. Motilal Oswal Mutual Fund
14. Peerless Mutual Fund
15. Principal Mutual Fund
16. Reliance Mutual Fund
17. SBI Mutual Fund
18. Tata Mutual Fund
19 UTI Mutual Fund

Apart from online mutual funds and SIPs, we also provide a mutual fund portfolio tracker facility which can be used to track all your mutual fund investments in one place. Active Investment Services can be used as an SIP mutual fund app and a portfolio tracking app.

We are one of India's top-rated Best Mutual Fund app, SIP App, and ELSS Tax Saving Investment App.
descriptionShort: India’s Best Online Mutual Fund Investment App, SIP, ELSS & track MF Portfolio .
